children.name: USE_APP_DEMO_VIDEO_TRANSSER
children.title: Enable USE APP DEMO VIDEO TRANSSER

children.name: SHELL_ASYNCLOG
children.title: Enable Shell and Async log optimize

children.name: MASTER_CORE
children.title: Dual cpu core run as master core

children.name: SLAVE_CORE
children.title: Dual cpu core run as slave core

children.name: DUAL_CORE
children.title: Dual cpu core run as master core

children.help:
When this option is enable, more memory will be consumed because
a fixed length debug block will be appended to every memory allocated
from heap.

Moreover, suggest disable task/watchdog when this option is enabled
in case os_dump_memory_stats() triggers watchdog.
children.name: MEM_DEBUG
children.title: Enable memory debug

children.name: APP_MAIN_TASK_STACK_SIZE
children.title: Stack size of application main task

children.name: BASE_MAC_FROM_RF_OTP_FLASH
children.title: Base mac from RF OTP flash

children.help: Don't disable it when WiFi-6 is enabled.
children.name: WIFI4
children.title: Enable WiFi 4

children.name: MEMDUMP_ALL
children.title: Dump all memory when exception happen

children.help: The value should be changed if print size is more than 128
children.name: PRINTF_BUF_SIZE
children.title: Print Buffer Size

children.help: This will set kfifo size when software uses kfifo to cache data receiving.
children.name: KFIFO_SIZE
children.title: Kfifo Size

children.help: The value should be changed if need to change i2c id
children.name: I2C_SUPPORT_ID_BITS
children.title: i2c support id bits

children.help: The value should be changed if need to change timer id
children.name: TIMER_SUPPORT_ID_BITS
children.title: timer support id bits
